definitions: involving marriage to one person at a time

examples.text: under Canadian law all marriages must be monogamous

shortDefinitions: nvolving marriage to one person at time

definitions: having a sexual relationship with only one partner at a time

examples.text: she admits that she has never been strictly monogamous
with me it was a monogamous relationship

shortDefinitions: having sexual relationship with only one partner

definitions: having only one mate at a time

examples.text: penguins form monogamous couples for breeding purposes
